entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 08:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -22.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -28.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
